thread.title: New NFL Bad Lip Reading Features Several Broncos
thread.title_full: New NFL Bad Lip Reading Features Several Broncos

author: Sports – CBS Denver
title: New NFL Bad Lip Reading Features Several Broncos
text:
BREAKING NEWS : Sources say the RTD security guard slaying suspect was found with Muslim documents ( More ) New NFL Bad Lip Reading Features Several Broncos February 1, 2017 4:59 PM (credit: Bad Lip Reading / YouTube) 
ENGLEWOOD, Colo. (CBS4) – The new NFL Bad Lip Reading is out, and it’s spectacular. 
Or, rather, it’s amazingable. 
“Yeah, I made up a word, but you can repeat that all week.” 
Three current Broncos players and coaches are featured in the video. 
Linebacker Todd Davis is the first to appear at about 35 seconds in, with Von Miller (1:43) and head coach Vance Joseph (1:52) following.
